comment: Lemma for ~ minvec . The convergent point of the Cauchy sequence ` F ` attains the minimum distance, and so is closer to ` A ` than any other point in ` Y ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-May-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.) (Revised by AV, 3-Oct-2020.)
